post.text: Join me LIVE in St. Augustine, FL!

comment.author: Adam
comment.text: Don't mail your ballot. Physically walk it in to your voting place if possible. The news said with all the ballots they have received, Hillary is ahead. Excuse me? How the hell would they know that?

replies.author: Adam
